语言设置(Language Settings): 非法的Colmap可执行文件路径
自动搜索Colmap可执行文件路径

Language Settings: Sets the gradient disappearance distance of the 3D view grid. Beyond this distance, the coordinate grid will not be visible.
语言设置(Language Settings): 设置三维视图格网的渐变消失距离。超过该距离，坐标格网将不可见。

Language Settings: Sets the z-offset distance of the grid. The purpose of this option is to allow this option to be kept very small.
语言设置(Language Settings): 设置格网的z轴偏移距离。该选项的目的是允许请将该选项保持在一个很小的数值。
重置用户设置（需要重启）
清除所有用户数据（需要重启）

Language Settings: This option will reset all user settings
语言设置(Language Settings): 这一选项会重置所有用户设置

Language Settings: This option will delete all user data
语言设置(Language Settings): 这一选项会删除所有的用户数据

Language Settings: The best combination is: down sample * 16 = blur radius.
语言设置(Language Settings): 最佳组合为: 降采样 * 16 = 模糊半径
